title: MSAffect: Adversarial Sequence Alignments for Protein Structure Prediction using AlphaFold
description: This project introduces MSAffect, an end-to-end computational framework for generating, perturbing, and evaluating MSAs to probe the influence of alignment changes on AlphaFold-style structure prediction.

title: NEXT 3D: A Simulation-Based Approach to Nanoparticle Design for Targeted Glioblastoma Multiforme Thermotherapy
description: We present NEXT 3D, a novel simulation assisting in the optimization of the nanoparticle design process for glioblastoma multiforme treatment via thermotherapy.

title: Glioblasted: Histological Image Classification for Glioblastoma Multiforme Detection
description: Given a full image of a histopathological slide of glioblastoma multiforme at 20x zoom, image classification algorithms determine whether the cancer is benign or malignant.
